faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: Coverview is a tool to create cover images for your blogs quickly and easily.
faq.a2: Yes! Coverview is absolutely free to use.
faq.q3: Can I upload my custom brand logo?
faq.a3: Yes. Just search and select <1>custom</1> in icon section and you can upload your own logo to personalize your cover images.
faq.q4: Can I use coverview for non-technical/personal blogs?
faq.a4: Yes! Why not? Even though coverview was built with technical blogs in mind, you can still use it for your personal blogs. Check out the stylish theme for more.
faq.a5: Because it's simple, quick and easy to use. Why spend hours designing when you can create cover images in seconds?
faq.a6: If coverview adds value in your life and you wish to support this project, you can <1>sponsor the original author on Github</1>.
faq.a7: This project's initial version was developed by <1>rutikwankhade</1>. The current version is developed by <3>z4none/CoverView</3>.
